name: legman-logger
description: A simple library build for streaming in strictly object mode

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run transpile && istanbul cover _mocha -- -- test/*.js
scripts.leakage: npm run lint && npm run transpile && LEAKAGE_TEST=1 mocha
scripts.docker:lint: docker-compose build --pull lint && docker-compose run --rm lint
scripts.docker:test: docker-compose build --pull test && docker-compose run --rm test
scripts.docker:leakage: docker-compose build --pull leakage && docker-compose run --rm leakage
scripts.docker:example: docker-compose build --pull example && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports example

author: Arne Schubert
